channel.title: ::pnpc command

item.title: ::pnpc command
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

anyone got any idea why my ::pnpc command only lasts until i move?

if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("pnpc") && p.rights >= 3) { p.npcType = (Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])); p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; }

Read full topic
